channel.title: games on Michael Pilosov: The Archives
channel.description: Recent content in games on Michael Pilosov: The Archives

item.title: Poker & Game Night
item.description: Math Club held several Poker and Game nights, where we provided food and snacks for students to come and relax after a long day at school and enjoy some social spaces that did not involve alcohol or drugs (or math). At one of these, we also had the opportunity to introduce a game that Dr. Simon I had worked on, since I finally managed to write a program in a way that could be used by other people.

item.title: Mathematics of Billiards
item.description: Billiards night was one of the first events that Christina and I plan for Math Club. It was a relatively simple event, focused on bringing together people For a night of pool and pizza. We played videos about billiards, including ones that went over the geometry of planning different types of shots on televisions in the background of the pool hall. We held this event several times over the years.
